metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25743 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A lack of in app notification for entering fullscreen mode could have lead to a malicious website spoofing browser chrome.
*This bug only affects Firefox Focus. Other versions of Firefox are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 110 and Firefox ESR < 102.8.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap only affects firefox focus

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
